China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2023 年 12 月 31 日星期日 17:11:24 GMT 120
Djokovic delivers as Serbia beat China in United CupNovak Djokovic closed out his spectacular 2023 on a winning note as the world number one eased past China's Zhang Zhizhen 6-3 6-2 on his United Cup debut on Sunday before doubling up to secure a 2-1 victory for Serbia in the mixed team tournament. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 16:31:22 GMT OLUF3MOG3VIHRPTOOILVLNF77U https://www.reuters.com/sports/tennis/djokovic-delivers-serbia-beat-china-united-cup-2023-12-31/Reuters运动的网球
Xi says China to consolidate and enhance economic recovery in 2024President Xi Jinping said on Sunday that China will consolidate and enhance the positive trend of its economic recovery in 2024, and sustain long-term economic development with deeper reforms. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 12:31:40 GMT BYGCFZFPJBJJZHE6J755VPMHFI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/xi-says-china-consolidate-enhance-economic-recovery-2024-2023-12-31/Reuters世界中国
Final bodies found after China's most serious earthquake in a decadeThe bodies of the two remaining people missing in the aftermath of China's most serious earthquake in nearly a decade were found on Sunday, a tragedy that has renewed concern over exposed populations in seismically active zones. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 07:01:58 GMT JEWSD2DZINJ27A6J5ER54QENHU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/final-bodies-found-after-chinas-most-serious-earthquake-decade-2023-12-31/Reuters世界中国
China Dec factory contraction deepens, more stimulus on the cardsChina's manufacturing activity shrank for a third straight month in December. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 02:10:10 GMT KEGTFRN6BVKTXMHHIJQXXYBMUQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-dec-factory-activity-shrinks-more-than-expected-bodes-ill-recovery-2023-12-31/Liangping Gao, Kevin Yao市场宏观问题
China's Xi says 'reunification' with Taiwan is inevitableChina's "reunification" with Taiwan is inevitable, President Xi Jinping said in his New Year's address on Sunday, striking a stronger tone than he did last year with less than two weeks to go before the Chinese-claimed island elects a new leader. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 01:25:53 GMT 5R5CRTRLWROU5IBLIPF5MZXII4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-calls-taiwan-president-frontrunner-peace-destroyer-2023-12-31/Reuters世界亚太地区
How China talked markets out of a run on the yuanInterviews with 28 sources show at least two dozen cases where regulators steered market participants through coordinated actions this year to resist pressure on the currency. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 22:04:38 GMT UVQJE7JBK5PZZBRPHY2M2JNRAI https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/how-china-talked-markets-out-run-yuan-2023-12-30/Reuters市场货币
ASEAN foreign ministers express concern over South China Sea tensionsForeign ministers of Southeast Asia's regional bloc ASEAN on Saturday expressed their concern over growing tensions in the South China Sea which they said could threaten regional peace and urged for peaceful dialogue among parties. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 16:34:15 GMT 4E7VU5YIM5KMJDB5GLJWA2FTDE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/asean-foreign-ministers-express-concern-over-south-china-sea-tensions-2023-12-30/Reuters世界亚太地区
Chinese military purge exposes weakness, could widenThe purges are a setback for Xi Jinping, who has pumped billions into the military. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 14:02:54 GMT SDCN54JPNFJFPNGHAIQJNMFYHM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/sweeping-chinese-military-purge-exposes-weakness-could-widen-2023-12-30/Yew Lun Tian, Laurie Chen世界中国
China's central bank agrees Ant Group's Alipay has no controllerChina's central bank has agreed that popular payment app Alipay has no controller following a sweeping business overhaul of Jack Ma's Ant Group, the fintech giant that owns the app, according to the website of the People's Bank of China. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 13:27:56 GMT WMYPY63KLBO7TG5CRZTMH2XPLU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-central-bank-agree-ant-groups-alipay-has-no-control-2023-12-30/Reuters世界中国
China eases visa application for U.S. touristsChina will simplify visa applications for tourists from the United States from Jan. 1, cutting the documents required, according to a notice on Friday on the website of the Chinese embassy in Washington. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 07:09:10 GMT KJBZ2CDRG5JXVK3K7KHPLECBSE https://www.reuters.com/world/china-eases-visa-application-us-tourists-2023-12-30/Reuters世界
Xi urges Chinese envoys to create 'diplomatic iron army'Chinese President Xi Jinping on Friday urged Chinese ambassadors to forge a "diplomatic iron army" loyal to the Communist Party, reviving the abrasive "Wolf Warrior" rhetoric propagated by some diplomats as a sign of China's increasingly assertive foreign policy. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 13:30:03 GMT E6PBM2IYCZLTDECY6EBTCI6HTY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/xi-urges-chinese-envoys-create-diplomatic-iron-army-2023-12-29/Laurie Chen世界中国
